summary: How the tol shows his love
body:
How the tol shows his love

Sherlock: you are so adorable it hurts

Holmes: I am not adorable

Sherlock: you are so small

Holmes: I’m not small. Just funsized

Sherlock brings Holmes in for a cuddle.

Holmes: why is this happening?

Sherlock: embrace the madness

——————————————————————————————-

Stephen: you touch so much as a hair on that precious ptsd cinnamon roll, I will disembowl you. You hear me you grapefruit!?!

Tony: oh god I think I’m in love

Stephen: great that makes it easier for me to ask you out

Tony: what did you just say?

Stephen: so what are you doing after this?

Tony: dude we are in the middle of a fight. Not now!

Stephen: if the world ends, would you let me fuck you?

Tony: and that’s my cue to go and fight on the other side of Thanos

——————————————————————————————-

In the middle of an interview

Cumberbatch: oh yes I hope we get to see all the bloopers on set once the d-errr hey guys look who has decided to join the interview

Robert goes to sit next to Ben only to be pulled on to his lap instead.

RDJ: I don’t think we can call this a Benedict Cumberbatch interview if Benedict Cumberbatch can’t be seen

Benedict: oh nonsense

Interviewer: yeah this can be an exclusive For The Tumblr Fans Interview ft. guests Robert Downey Jr and Benedict Cumberbatch

Benedict: that’s the spirit

summary:
Requested by anonymous 

 At first in Tony’s eyes, you were just another intern. Slowly he started to realize your potential....
caption:
Requested by anonymous

At first in Tony’s eyes, you were just another intern. Slowly he started to realize your potential. You were incredibly smart so one day after work Tony decided to strike up a conversation with you. In the end you and Mr Stark talked until it was pitch black outside. Looking down on his watch, Tony gave you an apologetic slap on the back.

”Sorry kid I kept you way too late. Your parents are probably going to kill me” the genius invented chuckled. Not wanting to share your personal situation with your boss after one talk, you just awkwardly laughed in return.
“How are you getting home?”.

”Oh I’m just going to catch the subway” you answered. However Tony didn’t like this reply because his face immediately.

”At this time of night? No way, call your parents i’m sure they’ll come pick you up” Tony replied. Sighing you were forced to inform Tony that you couldn’t have your parents come pick you up.
“Why not?”.

”Because my parents aren’t… here” you replied. This made Tony cock an eyebrow. Clearly it didn’t get what you meant.
“I mean that they’re not in the country Mr Stark. My family stayed behind while I came to the U.S by myself”.

”Really?! I didn’t know… you know what kid? I’ll give you a ride home myself. I’d like to hear more about your family”.

REQUESTS ARE OPEN

blog.description: All original content

summary: Headcannon headcannon that Thanos can’t snap. he just can’t. It’s like those people who go through their lives and they can’t...
body:
Headcannon

headcannon that Thanos can’t snap. he just can’t. It’s like those people who go through their lives and they can’t whistle or curl their tongue. Well let me tell you, if I can’t snap, then thanos can’t snap either. So IW happens and we’re in the scene where it all goes to shit and he raises his hand. and nothing happens. his fingers just sliiiiiiiide together. And everyone’s standing there in shocked silence waiting for the end but thANOS CANT SNAP HIS DAMN FINGERS. roll credits. the end.

trail.content:
Headcannon

headcannon that Thanos can’t snap. he just can’t. It’s like those people who go through their lives and they can’t whistle or curl their tongue. Well let me tell you, if I can’t snap, then thanos can’t snap either. So IW happens and we’re in the scene where it all goes to shit and he raises his hand. and nothing happens. his fingers just sliiiiiiiide together. And everyone’s standing there in shocked silence waiting for the end but thANOS CANT SNAP HIS DAMN FINGERS. roll credits. the end.

summary: Avengers University: Chapter Eleven: Strange Keeping The Party Loki
title: Avengers University: Chapter Eleven: Strange Keeping The Party Loki
body:
Chapter 1     MasterList

 Peter Parker takes The Reader to Stephens party celebrating his achievement of becoming the Sorcerer Supreme that Tony Stark is throwing on his behalf. There was no way The Reader would pass up looking hot and surprising Doctor Strange, but after some shocking surprises the night she thought was not the night she will end with.

Female X Reader

Warnings: SMUTTTTT, NSFW, Violence, Cursing, (Sex Scene)

Bored you sit in the communal rec room of the Avengers Tower slouched in a chair staring at your phone. You let out long sighs hoping to get someone’s attention. Seeing no one will come to your rescue you float out of the chair and down the hall stopping to Thor’s opened door you let your feet his the ground, he’s looking in the mirror and back to his phone witch is playing a “How to tie a tie” tutorial on youtube.

“Hey Thor, need some help?, I know my palms are bandaged up but my fingers still work"

Thor tried to give you a warm hello but is far to frustrated with his tie problem,

“It may seem I acquire some assistance,” Thor said bashfully. With a smirk you walk into his room fixing the huge knot he has created,

“My Ex always had some trouble with his tie’s,“ you smiled getting the knot loose, "I think he kept wearing them just so I could help him put them on, so what’s the occasion?”

“I have a very important date with Jane Foster.”.

Yyou share his enthusiasm as you swing one end of the tie under the other,

“Thor that’s great! I’m so happy for you!”

Thor looked to your bandages losing his joy,

“I heard you went in search for my Brother, how you were burned by the power of the mind stone,”

you gave a half smile as you nodded,

“Yes, Its a lot more painful than being tazed in sakar,“ you snikker then sighed into a desperate tone, "I just wanted to see him, make sure he’s ok, try to get him to come back” you finished tying his tie and Thor wanted to comfort you.

“Loki would be incredibly flattered if he knew the lengths you take to find him,”

you tried to smile but if that was true then he be here to tell you himself.

“Well I found out the hard way that if someone disappears and tells no one were they gone..” you take a breath, “prolly want to be left alone.”.

Thor let out a dark chuckle,

“Certainly I could of told you that,”

“Well,“ you look to your phone, "I better let you finish getting ready,” you smile backing out the door, Thor waves you off and you walk back to the chair.

Your loud bored sighs turn into groans as you lay uncomfortably in your chair waiting for replies from your friends.

“Can we keep it down?” Tony asked standing in the hall covered in grease holding a part of his latest suite, “I can’t hear myself think with all your depressed wailing.”.

You stay slouched in the chair,

“Sorry Mr.Stark, I’m just bored,”

“Where’s your Hunka Hunka Wizard?“ Tony asked finding a seat acros from you,

you sit up in your chair and smirk sarcastically,

“Who Wong?”

Tony points his finger at you,

“Hey leave the snark to the professionals.”.

Tony tweaked a screwdriver in his Suite part as you sat up a little nerveous,

“If your talking about I don’t know.. maybe Doctor Strange..“ you go on, "Wong texted me he’s taking a house call, something about mind maggots,”

“Oh, Wong messaged you? huh kinda odd for a Professor to have his man servant text his student,” Tony tilted his head at you.

“Wong is more than a Manservant,” You said changing your tone.

Tony looked to you through his glasses,

“Your only proving my point,”

Before you could say another word to dig you even deeper in the hole your phone buzzed, quickly you grab it off the table.

But your hope of hanging out with Gamora and Wanda vanished when you read the text releasing another depressing groan,

“Fucken double dates!“ you put your hands up, "AM I JUST GONNA BE FOREVER ALONE!?” you yell.

A sudden voice comes from behind you,

“Not on my watch beautiful,”

you turn and smile widely to your hero,

“Peter! Thank god!” you get up to hug him tight, “What are you doing here!?”

“My, (y/n), senses were tingling,” you giggled with him still shocked you two are super heros.

Tony still annoyed with all the noise cleared his throat loud enough to break you two apart and look in his direction.

“I texted him by the way,“ Tony said phone in hand, "Hey here’s an Idea,” he smiled fakely acting all excited, “why don’t you guys go train outside?”

You gasp then lock eyes with Peter,

“Why haven’t we done this yet?!” you questioned.

Peter shared your excitement,

“To the training yard!” Peter shouted and you both race through the hall.

Tony sighed,

“Finally,” he said leaning back in the chair getting comfortable, “hey friday, play some hendrix.”.

Once on the field you two help each other stretch,

“So how’s it going with that dude?” you asked him as you sat in the grass in butterfly stretch.

Peter stretching his legs blushed innocently,

“Oh Wade, he really is persistent,” Peter laughed lightly, “I don’t know really, weve been hooking up and hanging out but, he’s a little uh, coo coo for coco puffs”

You snort grabbing your foot with your hands leaning into your leg,

“You can’t help who you fall for Parker,” you said with a soft smile,

You nod getting up,

“Any ground rules?”

Peter gave a half smile and a shrug,

“No flying,”

you sigh, flying is a major advantage,

“seems fair,“ you put your hands up clenching training daggers, "lets see what you got.”.

You two were about to start till your stopped by Falcon.

“Hey,“ he walks over ant man suddenly appears next to him, "you two kids about to train without a spectator?” Sam asked arms crossed.

Hand on hip you look to Falcon feeling a little insulted,

“Were not kids, were avengers”

Peter agrees with you,

“Ya, represent” Peter yelled as he slapped his chest, you broke and started to laugh at him, Peter couldint help but laugh with you, Scott Lang laughs too.

Falcon looked to him brow raised Scot shrugs at him and says,

“What, I enjoy there youthful friendship, makes me miss my daughter, this one time Cassie and I-”

Falcon sighed igroring Scots story,

“Ok, “Avengers” Falcon said using air quotes, “lets see it,” Falcon crosses his arms as if nothing could impress him.

You and Pete eyed each other with confident determined faces. “Ok, no holding back” you said getting hyped.

Pete nodded and you two slapped hands then backed away creating distance, you two start to circle each other.

You start with a low power radiation beam shooting it directly at Peter, effortlessly Peter dodges it flipping in the air showing off his acrobatic skills.

While he was in mid flip you closed the distance to get up close and personal.

Training dagger in hand you aggressively slash at Peter with a roundhouse kick following your blade just how Black Widow taught you, he backed up trying to keep balance but your attacks were to close together he didn’t feel your rubber blade but he felt the bottom of your shoe size across his face.

The shear power behind your kick sent Peter spinning clockwise, while hes trying to focus his dizzy vision, you blast him with radiation beams which burned off your bandages, fast Peter senscend the heat of your blasts and jumped over them, his reflexes were something to behold, one he tried to matrix by bending backwards singeing a lock of his hair to which he yelled out,

“No My dew!”

“Did you just say your Dew?” you asked laughing.

“Say hello to my little friend” Peter yelled as he shot his webbs at your right hand.

You look to the ooey gooey webbing wrapped around your fist,

“Gross, Gross, GROsS!” you frantically wave your hand in hopes to get the webbing off which did not do shit.

As you were frantically frailing Peter leaps forward and double foot kicks you right in your motherfucking chest, you fall to the grass, Lying on your back you gasp trying to regain the air you just lost back in you lungs.

You sit up rubbing your boobs and exclaimed,

“Dude! My Fucking titts!!”

“My bad,“ Pete said thinking the fight was over,

"Wow, you’re like really good! Did you get bit by something radioactive too!?” Peter asked letting his guard down,

“More like ate something radioactive,” You anserwd as your eyes glowed white with radiation,

You clench both fists and the webbing on your hand proseeds to bubble and melt off.

Peter’s face quickly went from relaxed to concern as he saw what it was like to be on the wrong end of your powers, you levitate up in the air and began to fire a buage of radiation beams at Peter, who flung himself out of the way and web lassos your feet.

With a Yank your swung back to the ground with a hard thud, you grunt feeling the hard impact of the grassy floor, he then casts a large web net over your entire body, and nervously yells out, “IM SORRY! IM SORRY! IM SORRY!” as both his hands cover his mouth he could see he made you a little fired up,

you take in therapeutic breath and say,

“Sorry I went all Phoenix on you!” Your body heats melting away the webbing, geting up you eye him and start to stomp over.

You ook at the damage you brought upon his hair only to be tricked by a well placed flip to be behind you,

thinking fast you turn to stab him in the gut with your rubber training dagger, Pete looked down and held it dramatically faking his death he plops to the floor closing his eyes and sticking out his tongue.

You laugh as he opened one eye curious to see if he humored you. Falcon and Ant man clapped declaring you the winner, you help Pete to his feet, suddenly you hear everyone’s notification tones go off and wonder why yours hasn’t,

“Is it a mission?“ you asked picking your phone off the grass, "I didn’t get anything”

“It’s just the barcode invitation for Doctor Strange’s party tonight.”.

Your brows raised in confusion,

“Party?! He’s on a house call! the, the mind maggots!” you went on scrolling your texts looking for the one Wong sent you.

Falcon glared ay Peter as if he said something he shouldn’t have,

“Uh he must be doing that before the party and forgot to tell you,” Peter said trying to calm you down, you lock your phone trying to convince yourself that that’s the truth, there was no reason for him to keep somthing like a party from you,

“Why is he having a party?” you asked.

“He just got promoted to sorcerer Supreme, Tony is the one throwing it, he must of forgot to invite you cause your not close to the guy,”

Now your brows connected, Tony was gonna keep you in the dark about something this big you were just sitting next to the ass hole for fifteen minutes. Strange was probably way too busy to tell you of this achievement ya, that has to be it you thought to yourself.

Scott felt for you seeing how bad you wanted to go,

“I can’t make it out tonight,“ Scot explained, "my Daughter has a school play and I haven’t missed one since i’ve been off house arrest,” He went on unlocking his phone, “i’ll send you my invite.”.

You smiled as you gasped clenching your hands together, “Thank you! Thank you!”

“No problem, give me your number i’ll send it now".

Hooked arms with Pete you two walk the mall looking for your last minute dress since the party was labeled black tie and all you have is dark clothes, skimpy clothes, flannels and band tshirts.

Looking through racks and racks of gorgeous dresses you sigh and groan at the price tags and sizes.

“This place is pricey,” Pete said holding a dress up to your body,

“Fuck ya man, only being a part time avenger, paychecks look pretty pathetic,”

“Try this one,” Pete said handing you a sexy deep v dress that showed off a classy amount of cleavage with one small strap going across each breast.

Your heart skipped beats swooning over this dress, you had to try it on, you grab it and run to a changing room.

Stripping down you take a deep breath praying this dress will accept your body type, once on you looked to a mirror and squealed, you walk out to show Peter who’s jaw dropped.

“(y/n)!“ Peter gasped, "You look amazing, I mean…. wow,”

"Oh stawp,” you blush tucking loose hair behind your ear turning to the giant mirror.

You melted in front of the mirror, you loved how the slit tastefully revealed your right leg,

“Remind me to shave my legs when we get back,” you smirked to Peter who laughed, you laughed a little too till you saw the price tag and your heart sank to the pit of your stomach.

“What’s wrong?“ he looked to the price, "Ooooo,” he glanced at your sad face, “don’t worry about it, i got it.”.

You shake your head,

“No, no way Peter, I can’t let you do that,” you protested,

Peter just shook his hand nonchalantly,

“No seriously let me,” he takes out a wad of cash around a rubber band, your eyes nearly popped out of your skull gawking at all those benjamins.

“What the fuck” you whispered looking around making sure no one sees you two, “did you rob a bank?!” you asked in a violent judgemental whisper.

“What?” Pete laughed “Noo, My uhhh, Wade has a pretty sick job and kinda spoils me, It’s pretty embarrassing, so let me help you buy that gorgeous dress”.

You smiled, giddy to wear it but a little guilty for his contribution.

“Thank you Pete you sure your BF wont mind?”

“Im sure,”

You kiss him on the cheek, and he grin’s,

“I’m gonna hold you a place in line we gotta hurry up I had my tux sent to your place, we only got a couple hours till it starts,”

“This is gonna be so much fun,” you squealed as you go back to the dressing room to change.

At your place you and Peter get ready, you put your makeup on in the mirror playing your get ready to party music playlist, while Peter is tying his Bow tie he steals a glimpses of you then he looked back to the mirror laughing to himself.

“You know what this reminds me of?” Pete asks,

“Prom?” you answered applying dark lipstick,

“Exactly!“ Peter exclaimed with excitement, "Eddie got us a Limo! That night was crazy!”

You stop for a second lowering your lipstick you look at yourself in the mirror remembering how Eddie used to be, so sweet kind but that was so long ago you never think about him anymore, you pull yourself out of your head.

“Hopefully this time you won’t drink too much champagne,” You hear him laugh as you put on mascara.

You get up to see yourself in the full length mirror, Pete couldn’t stop smiling, you looked so beautiful so stunning.

“Who knew under all that grit and flannels there was a fine ass women,”

You laugh playfully shoving Peter for his comment.

“You ready?” you asked and he nodded looking at his phone,

“ya, Happy just pulled the car up,” he gave you his arm to wrap your hands around him,

“Oh, such a gentleman” you flirted,

“Ya ya, did you bring the flask?”

You pull up your dress to reveal a flask secured by a garter, he laughs as you two left for the car.

Happy parked at the side of the giant extravagant building you could barely control your nerves, Stephen is somewhere in there prolly looking fresh as fuck.

Peter raced Happy to opening your door, the sound of the car door opening snapped you back to reality, you grab Peters hand helping you out of the car. Your a pro in heels but today you were wobbling, you two scan your invitations at the front door and make your way inside.

People began to turn there heads seeing you walk in, Bucky nearly choked on his drink,

“Holly shi-“

“Language” Steve said interrupting his potty mouth.

Wanda who was in a beautiful scarlet dress, and Gamora in a two piece emerald dress sped walked to you stunned,

“Damn babe, you look fucken hot!” Gamora said with an open smile,

Wanda laughed,

“Your hair even looks glamorous did you wash it?“

The compliments made you bashful,

“Oh staawwwwwppp, I just wanted to look nice.”.

“Well you did it,” Gamora looked to Peter, “Oh, hey Peter, how are you?”

“I’m good just escorting my lovely Cinderella to the ball,” Gamora had a confused look,

“Its a Disney princess” Quill whispered to her, then greeted Peter.

“Lets go back to our table, Vision is over there" Wanda said walking over to him,

“We will meet you there, we gotta get drinks first,” Peter told them holding your hand leading you to the bar you look around for Strange still no sign of him.

Standing at the Bar you order a Vodka Redbull and Pete orders a Long Island and two shots. Scanning the bottom floor and the top you felt more and more worried you never find Stephen at his own party.

Pete calls to you handing you a shot,

“(y/n),“ you look to him, "stop being nervous I can feel it from here, it’s making my hair stand up,”

you hold the shot,

“Im sorry man, I just need to chill” you clank your shot with his,

“To Chilling” he said before you both knock them back.

You stick your tongue out making a blehk noise while shaking your head,

“Damn, that was strong!“

“Hey guys!!” Quil yelled over the music, you two turn to him and wave,

"Were going to the dance floor come on!”

You look to Peter,

“you ready to tear it up?”

Pete smiled grabbing your drinks,

“Come on dork" he said walking with you to a table by the dance floor dropping off the drinks.

You dance on Peter, his hands grip your waist spinning you around to dance face to face your arms around him slid down to feel his abs,

“Damn, I need to work out” suddenly Gamora pulled you away from Pete,

“Dance with me, I miss you!”

you laugh,

“Ok but I wanna be the dude,“ Gamora giggled as she turned around to sway her backside into your front. Gamora raised a hand to wrap around your neck your hands were on her hips, she turned to you,

You nodded,

“Oh fuck ya,” you breath in, “show Quil,”

Quil looked to you two practically drooling,

“Oh no its cool, watching you two dance on each other is way better” you two roll your eyes laughing.

You feel someone’s hands slide to your waist, you smile already knowing by the spiderman cup links who it was so you back into him.

“Wow, you seem taller,” you said shaking your hips, his hands then run up to grope your chest you gasp and turn to face him, “Wow, handsy!” you said before you were dumbfounded to see it wasn’t Peter.

You gasp and immediately slapped the stranger in the mask, “Hands off perv!!!” you shout angerly,

“Oooooo,“ he rubbed his cheek, "spicy.”.

You get beyond pisst winding your arm back to punch him hard,

“Wait stop!“ Peter yelled as he ran in between you too,

You let your hand down still agitated,

“Why you defending this guy he squeezed my melons!”

“I figured he would, im sorry (y/n), this is Wade,” Peter said kinda embarrassed.

You raised a brow,

“Ohhhhh, this is the guy?” you point at him,

“The names Deadpool, sorry for grabbing on your bazoongas, they just looked sooooo good, real honkadonkaberonkadunks”

He spoke funny kinda made you wanna laugh too but you didint,

“Ya well, do it again and you lose a hand” you warned geting more relaxed.

Peter and Deadpool gave each other a look wich confused you.

Deadpool pulled Peter in for a kiss through his mask,

“Wanna dance? I got some moves I can show ya”

Pete blushed, “What kind of moves?” He asked,

Deadpool whispered in his ear and Peter had a very uncomfortable look on his face as he covered his mouth, Wade grabbed his hand and led him into the bathroom.

“Well that was interesting,” Wanda said watching them leave to the bathroom,

you said nothing just kept repeating his name in your head,

“Wade, Wade, Were did i hear that?” you thought staring off, your mind went blank once you finally saw Stephen at the bar, wasting no time you slip out of the crowd and to the bar.

You walked over slowly thinking of what to say, how he will look at you happy to see you, how you to would share the night together, you got closer he sat at the bar back to you, with one deep breath you tap his shoulder.

Stephen turned with a smile that quickly faded once he saw you,

“(y/n)!“ he got out of the chair beginning to act anxious, "why are you here?”

Your heart plummeted,

“What do you mean? I came to congratulate you,”

A women turned over to Strange locking her arms around his arm,

“Stephen!” She smiled widely looking to you, “is this one of your students?!”

Your eye twitched as you looked to her as she went on,

“awwww she’s so sweet to congratulate her teacher, I’m Christina Palmer,” she extends a hand to you,

You just look at it then to her,

“Doctor Palmer?”

she nodded as you shook her hand,

“Oh you heard of me?” she giggled, “now which one are you, the one who can run fast? Or the one who can fly?”

You grit your teeth,

“Ill show you which one I am” you said as your eyes fogged white and radiant orbs casted your palms, she frowned confused.

Strange pulled you away,

“If you could excuse us for a moment Christine,” Strange asked pulling you into the kitchen.

Once you too where in the kitchen he turned to you,

“How in hell are you here!? I told Tony not to give you an invitation!”

Your lip quivered Stephens words hurt you and that made you mad, you crossed your arms trying hide how hurt you are.

“Why? So I wouldn’t see you with her! I know you use to love her, The other Stephen told me!”

Doctor Strange looked to you as if you were fucking up everything hes been trying to keep secret,

“She’s here so people wont get suspicious about me messing around with a student” He whispered to you violently,

You blink in disbelief,

“Is that all I am to you!? a dirty secret?!” you question him geting hysterical.

“What? No! Quit twisting my words!,“ he calmed down, put a hand to his forehead, "this was a mistake”

“So now Im a mistake?” you asked brows connected,

Strange had enough of you talking back,

“Can you lower your voice before you cause a scene and cost me my job?!” He asked again in a violent whisper, that was it, your hands shoot up,

“I’m done hiding how I feel, especially to a man who treats me this way, do you see this fuken dress!” Steven looked to your gown, “I put this on for you! I wanted to look good for you!” you explained choking up,

Stephen sighed taking in your dress,

“That is a nice dress”

Feeling shitty for messing with his night, you sigh as well and look to the left,

“No, no its ok I guess this wasn’t going to work anyway not until I graduate or you quit,”

you swallow the lump in your throat and hold back tears,

“Don’t let this ruin your night,” you said gazing as his tux, “I was right, you do look fresh as fuck,”

Stephen let out a short chuckle before grabbing your hands inspecting your palms,

“Your bandages are gone if you want to heal properly and fight off infection, there’s a first aid kit behind the bar, I can-”

you take your hands back,

"No, that’s ok I can do it myself, congratulations on your promotion,”

Was the last thing you said before walking out of the kitchen and straight to the bar.

Drinking a beer, feeling like melting another phone you lay your head in your arms, you dont even care about bandaging your hands,

“Lady (y/n),“

your head perked up to see Thor holding a giant mug of beer, he frowned seeing you so upset.

“Im sorry, did I interrupt you?”

“No,” you wipe your eyes and sniffle up your sadness, “no your good Thor,” you assured him as you conjured up a smile,

He smiled back,

“I’d like you to meet My Lady Jane,“ he gestures the women next to him, she smiles at you and you smile warmly to her.

“Hello, I heard so much about you,”
